title: Best of the Program | Guests: Ami Horowitz & Riley Moore | 7/28/22
description:
Glenn discusses CNN's claim of an "impostor Christianity" and exposes the Left's intent to warp Thomas Jefferson's original intent for separation of church and state. Filmmaker Ami Horowitz joins to discuss his latest video, which investigates the alliance between leftists and Palestine and exposes the LGBTQ persecution in Palestinian territories. West Virginia Treasurer Riley Moore joins to give his first interview regarding his state's latest anti-ESG actions against five big financial companies.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
